about_the_game:
The complete soundtrack of Fatal Twelve in FLAC and MP3 format.

Contains 48 tracks across 2 discs including the Opening Theme "Unveil" and Ending Theme "Glass Thread". Download includes a digital copy of the CD jacket which includes a track list and lyrics to the two vocal songs.

Soundtrack Staff:

Soundtrack Composer: Low

"Unveil"
Vocal: Kuyuri
Guitar Solo: Gesshi
Lyrics: TOSHIKI (from DAIZY BLUE)
Composition/Arrangement: Low

"Glass Thread"
Vocal: Kuyuri
Guitar Solo: Gesshi
Lyrics: Akeo
Composition/Arrangement: Low

name: Fatal Twelve Original Soundtrack
short_description: The complete soundtrack of the suspense visual novel, Fatal Twelve. Contains 48 tracks including the opening theme "Unveil" and the ending theme "Glass Thread".
